CHAT.comment: child is watching herself in mirror while sitting at table.
child brings pretend picture over to mom.
child puts hands in air and shrugs shoulders as if saying I don't know.
child pretends to draw picture at table.
child shows pretend picture to mom.
mom points to sign above computer box.
child pretends to draw picture and shows pretend picture to mom.
child whispers something into mother's ear.
child twirls around room while whispering the unintelligible word to mom.
child twirls around and almost runs into tank.
child moves dog's tail up and down.
child runs away from robodog and screams.
child rocks chair over onto floor while sitting on it.
child speaks nonsense words warning mother.
child shows mom her opened mouth.
child lays on belly on floor and moves forward before showing mom her teeth.
child moves mouth to imitate degu.
child puts fingers on top of cage.
mom presses button on top of computer box.
